item.title: Mass Surveillance is the Aim Of OnionDSL
item.description:
Mass Surveillance is the Aim Of OnionDSL

The UK is right around the corner from one of the biggest government surveillance power expansions since Snowden, and one network specialist isn't going to let that stop him from bringing privacy to the people.

item.title: Zero Day Exploits Are Easier To Find With This New System
item.description:
Zero Day Exploits Are Easier To Find With This New System

Arizona State University researchers created a way that makes gathering data from dark net markets and forums easy, and it helps identify new emerging cyber threats as they come out. The system uses search engines and dark net sites through the Tor network, and the researchers say they have found almost 30 marketplaces, and over 20 forums that black hat hackers are calling home.

item.title: First Bitcoin Related Crime Hits Punjab
item.description:
First Bitcoin Related Crime Hits Punjab

Police in Punjab are investigating their first ever case involving Bitcoin. Unfortunately, it also involves financial fraud data being purchased on the darknet. A group of four, two Punjab residents and two residence of the US stole Rs 1.2-crore worth of US Dollars using stole credit card data bought on darknet.

item.title: Utility Settlement Coin Aims to Set Industry Standard for Central Banking Digital Cash
item.description:
Utility Settlement Coin Aims to Set Industry Standard for Central Banking Digital Cash

A group of major banks; UBS, Deutsche Bank, Santander and BNY Mellon, as well as the broker ICAP, have teamed up to develop a new form of digital cash that will help to set an industry standard to clear and settle financial trades over a distributed ledger.

item.title: Judge Grants Cryptsy Lawsuit Class Action Status - CoinDesk
item.description:
Judge Grants Cryptsy Lawsuit Class Action Status - CoinDesk

A Florida judge has certified a class action lawsuit filed on behalf of customers of the now-defunct digital currency exchange Cryptsy. In an order issued yesterday, US District Judge Kenneth Marra approved a request by plaintiffs for class action certification, originally filed on 27th July.

item.title: Steemit or Synereo? Comparing Decentralized Social Networks
item.description:
Steemit or Synereo? Comparing Decentralized Social Networks

A new bitcointalk thread is currently raising issues which basically make comparisons between Steemit and Synereo. Though virtually every project in the industry has had some random allegations against them, the thread which was started on Friday August 19 was supposedly prompted by the recent announcement by Synereo that its Alpha version will be going online next month.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Stop Hit! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Stop Hit! - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening. The European session has now drawn to a close, and it's time to take a look at the action we saw in the bitcoin price throughout the day, and see if we can use that action to put together a strategy for this evening out of the US, and beyond, into Asia.

item.title: 3 Major Bitcoin Platforms in Philippines, Efficiency Comparison Test
item.description:
3 Major Bitcoin Platforms in Philippines, Efficiency Comparison Test

The Philippines has one of Asia's most sophisticated and complete Bitcoin platforms which enables users to settle any money-related bills, payments, and transfers with Bitcoin. Bitcoin platforms, including Coins.ph, BuyBitcoin.ph and Rebit.ph, are extremely popular in the Philippines because of their simple user interfaces and cost-effective services.

item.title: Bila Tserkva City Hall to Implement Blockchain Platform Auction 3.0
item.description:
Bila Tserkva City Hall to Implement Blockchain Platform Auction 3.0

According to the resolution "On introduction of amendments to the activity plan of Bila Tserkva City Hall as to preparation of regulation act bills for the year 2016", Gennadi Dikiy, the mayor of Ukrainian town Bila Tserkva, has filed a bill on using blockchain-based platform Auction 3.0 as one of instruments to be reviewed by the city council in the short term.

item.title: Can you make a blockchain where every node is a miner?
item.description:
Can you make a blockchain where every node is a miner?

I can spit like a spitting cobra. I had no clue about this until one day it accidentally happened when I was standing in front of the mirror trying to open my mouth to look at one of my teeth.
